info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 30 at 3:53PM MDT until June 30 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Bernalillo County in central New Mexico... Northeastern Valencia County in central New Mexico...
* Until 500 PM MDT.
* At 353 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was located over central Bernalillo and central Valencia Counties.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility at times with damaging winds in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Los Lunas, Belen, Valencia, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms, Isleta Pueblo, Meadow Lake, El Cerro Mission and South Valley.
This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 148 and 168. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 190 and 230.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 5:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 5:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
